snippet: Plant operators are struggling to contain radioactive water used to cool the damaged Fukushima reactor.
abstract: Tokyo Electric Power Co halts emergency operation to pump thousands of gallons of radioactive water from a leaking underground storage pool at crippled Fukushima Daiichi Nuclear Power Plant after workers discover that similar pool, to which the water is being transferred, is also leaking.
lead_paragraph: Plant operators are struggling to contain radioactive water used to cool the damaged Fukushima reactor.

headline.seo: Another Tank Leaks Water at Japanese Nuclear Plant
headline.main: Nuclear Plant in Japan Has Leak in Other Tank
headline.print_headline: Nuclear Plant In Japan Has Leak In Other Tank
